title: Invisible Ghost (1948 Horror film) Starring Bela Lugosi - Director: Joseph H. Lewis

sources.title: Invisible Ghost (1948 Horror film) Starring Bela Lugosi - Director: Joseph H. Lewis
sources.description:
Duo Movie with :
0:00 Black & White version of Invisible Ghost
1:03:01 Colorized version of Invisible Ghost AKA: Murder by the Stars / Phantom Monster / The Phantom Killer

Invisible Ghost is a 1941 American horror film directed by Joseph H. Lewis, produced by Sam Katzman and starring Bela Lugosi.

Summary:

The home of Charles Kessler is troubled by a series of mysterious murders.  Living with his daughter and servants after his wife’s departure, Kessler finds himself drawn into the investigation. As the police search for answers, Ralph Dickson, the fiancé of Kessler's daughter, is convicted of one of the crimes. When Ralph’s twin brother Paul arrives to seek the truth, a series of events leads to a chilling revelation that uncovers the mystery behind the murders.

Main Cast:
Bela Lugosi - Dr. Charles Kessler
Polly Ann Young - Virginia Kessler
John McGuire - Ralph Dickson and Paul Dickson
Clarence Muse - Evans the Butler
Terry Walker - Cecile Mannix
Betty Compson - Mrs. Kessler
Ernie Adams - Jules Mason
George Pembroke - Police Lieutenant Williams
Ottola Nesmith - Mrs. Mason 
Fred Kelsey - Detective Ryan
Jack Mulhall - Detective Tim
